 standard object services ---------------------------------------------------

Detailed Description

Abstract base for Composite types, for implementing Octree nodes.

Subcell numbering: 

    y z       6 7
    |/   2 3  4 5
     -x  0 1
in binary: 
    y z           110 111
    |/   010 011  100 101
     -x  000 001
